==Walkthrough==
# Enter the Domain
#* There is a Common Chest directly to the right of the starting point
# Cross the passageway safely by avoiding the [[flamethrower]]s; wait for the platforms to flip or deactivate the cores with a {{Cryo}} Skill
# Continue up ahead and enter the next room via stairs
#* There is an Exquisite Chest in a room next to the staircase that can be unlocked by defeating opponents {{Enemy List|Electro Slime*3}}
# Interrogate the Fatui Guard
#* There is a Common Chest located to the left of the Fatui Guard in a small enclosed space
# Interact with the console to open the door
# Proceed to the next room and activate the Door of Resurrection
#* There is a Common Chest located in the center-right that can be unlocked by defeating opponents {{Enemy List|Electro Cicin*3}}
# Defeat enemies {{Enemy List|Fatui Electro Cicin Mage/Greedy Guard;Wooden Shield Mitachurl/Timid Guard;Pyro Slime*3/investigating last room}}
# After obtaining the [[Hidden Key]], activate the mechanism at the center of the hallway to open the sealed door
# Proceed to the next room
# Interact with the console to start the lift
# Enter the room and activate the Door of Resurrection
# Defeat opponent {{Enemy List|Fatui Pyro Agent*1}}
# Obtain the Holy Lyre der Himmel
# Leave domain
